selections.name: Francesnfriends

selections.name: Show Time
selections.reason: Standout on paper. Beat #4 last out and holds a significant class advantage dropping from $50k levels.

selections.name: G'wildcat
selections.reason: High back numbers (104) but PPs indicate a potential layoff or gap; dangerous if ready.

danger_horse.name: G'wildcat
